snippet: A tip set off a raid at three apartments in a Lower Manhattan building, but no link to Philip Seymour Hoffman’s death was found.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Nick Corasaniti, James C. McKinley Jr., Sheelagh McNeill, Sarah Maslin Nir, Nate Schweber and Julie Turkewitz.

lead_paragraph: A tip set off a raid at three apartments in a Lower Manhattan building, but no link to Philip Seymour Hoffman’s death was found.

headline.main: 3 Arrested on Drug Charges as Police Pursue Hoffman Case
headline.print_headline: 3 Arrested on Drug Charges as Police Continue Investigation of Hoffman’s Death
